CustomField.description: Created this new field for SpotDraft - SOW Project Duration
CustomField.formula:
IF( AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup Plus')), OR(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0P000002EFLFQA4',PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01tRo000000TIb3IAG')),8, /*DAM or DAM + AI Search Experience*/ IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Professional'), OR(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0P000002EFLFQA4',PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01tRo000000TIb3IAG')),12, IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Enterprise'),ISBLANK(TEXT(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c))), OR(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0P000002EFLFQA4',PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01tRo000000TIb3IAG')),16,
IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup Plus'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Professional'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Enterprise'),ISBLANK(TEXT(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c))) ,OR(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01tRo000005zNBJIA2',PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01tRo000005zNJNIA2',PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01tRo000005zNODIA2')),2, /*BG*/
IF( AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup Plus'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Professional')), PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0P000002EFLGQA4'),4, IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Enterprise'),ISBLANK(TEXT(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c))), PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0P000002EFLGQA4'),6, /*Asset Workflow*/
IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup Plus'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Professional'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Enterprise'),ISBLANK(TEXT(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c))) ,OR(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000chp5AAA',PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0d000006PqK9AAK')),4, /*DBT*/
IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup Plus'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Professional'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Enterprise'),ISBLANK(TEXT(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c))) ,PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0P000002EGGgQAO'),4, /*PBT*/
IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup Plus'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Professional'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Enterprise'),ISBLANK(TEXT(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c))) ,OR(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000SF8cAAG',PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000SF8hAAG',PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000SF8mAAG')),4, /*Studio*/
IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Workgroup Plus'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Professional'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,'Enterprise'),ISBLANK(TEXT(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c))), OR(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000d7I0AAI',PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000d7I5AAI',PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000d7K1AAI')),2,0)))))))))) /*Content Workflow*/
CustomField.label: SpotDraft Module Project Duration
